blockr.dock 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Get block color based on category

    meta.Rd

    Returns metadata such as color hex codes for block categories using the Okabe-Ito colorblind-friendly palette.

    blk_color(category)

blks_metadata(blocks)

blk_icon_data_uri(icon_svg, color, size = 48, mode = c("uri", "inline"))

    Arguments

    category

    Block category

    blocks

    Blocks passed as blocks or block object

    icon_svg

    Character string containing the SVG icon markup

    color

    Hex color code for the background

    size

    Numeric size in pixels (default: 48)

    mode

    Switch between URI and inline HTML mode

    Contents

    Developed by Nicolas Bennett, David Granjon.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
